scenario.name: 12-A G729 call - Metaswitch CFS SIPREC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[field0 file="callee.csv"]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port];transport=udp SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];rport;branch=[branch] Allow-Events: message-summary, refer, dialog, line-seize, presence, call-info, as-feature-event, calling-name Call-ID: [call_id] From: <sip:[field0 file="tenant-users.csv"]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[field0 file="callee.csv"]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> CSeq: 941056654 INVITE Expires: 180 Organization: Metaswitch Networks Supported: resource-priority, siprec, 100rel Content-Length: [len] Require: siprec Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, BYE, REGISTER, OPTIONS, PRACK, UPDATE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, REFER, INFO, PUBLISH Max-Forwards: 70 Contact: <sip:[field0 file="tenant-users.csv"]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;+sip.src P-Asserted-Identity: <sip:[field0 file="tenant-users.csv"]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary=metaswitch-boundary

--metaswitch-boundary Content-Disposition: recording-session Content-Type: application/rs-metadata
